definition: hair worn in a bun or coil
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
hair rolled up in a bun, topknot

sentences.english: Mulan sat beneath the blossoming magnolia tree and removed her hail comb.
sentences.chinese: 木兰坐在开满红花的木兰树下，解下自己的发髻。

sentences.english: Women in ancient times because of the head shaped like a bun, formerly known as bun mountain.
sentences.chinese: 因形如古代妇女头上发髻，旧称髻山。

sentences.english: After the mid-Tang, follow the barbarian bun become fashionable.
sentences.chinese: 中唐以后，效仿胡人发髻成为时尚。

sentences.english: Beam with hair or wear a hat, towel child like.
sentences.chinese: 束着发髻或戴着个小帽，巾子之类的。

sentences.english: An eccentric professor with fringes of white hair, a top-knot and big nose?
sentences.chinese: 一个打扮怪异的白头发教授，头顶发髻，鼻子超大。

sentences.english: She wore her hair in a bun.
sentences.chinese: 她把头发梳成一个发髻。

sentences.english: Reliefs on coins of the young Empress Faustina show her with this coiffure .
sentences.chinese: 年轻的福斯蒂娜在硬币的浮雕上梳的就是这种发髻。

definition: hair rolled up in a bun, topknot
fine black hair/dried plum (sliced, as cake ingredient)
